org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Hash

  • 使用Hash的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util  

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util中Hash的使用

      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util中Hash的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  JenkinsHash
      Produces 32-bit hash for hash table lookup.
      class  MurmurHash
      This is a very fast, non-cryptographic hash suitable for general hash-based lookup.
      class  MurmurHash3
      This is a very fast, non-cryptographic hash suitable for general hash-based lookup.
      声明为Hash的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      Hash Function

      Get a singleton instance of hash function of a type defined in the configuration.
      static Hash Hash.getInstance(int type)
      Get a singleton instance of hash function of a given type.
